description: Complete test vectors for PKD specification. Includes both acceptance tests and rejection tests.

step-field-semantics.merkle-root-before: Merkle root before processing this step
step-field-semantics.merkle-root-after: Merkle root after acceptance; equals merkle-root-before if rejected
step-field-semantics.expect-fail: If true, this step MUST be rejected by implementations
step-field-semantics.protocol-message: Unsigned protocol message with symmetric keys for encrypted fields
step-field-semantics.signed-message: Protocol message with Ed25519 signature appended
step-field-semantics.hpke-wrapped-message: Signed message with padding, HPKE-encrypted (empty for BurnDown)
step-field-semantics.merkle-leaf: Data committed to Merkle tree: hash || server_sig || server_pk_hash
step-field-semantics.expected-error: Error description (only present when expect-fail is true)

steps.expected-error: Self-signed AddKey not allowed when keys exist
Operator and target domains must match
